verbs.description: sacramento removes benches along k street [ARG1: ten public benches] [V: disappeared] [ARGM-DIR: from the busy downtown sacramento k street mall] [ARGM-TMP: this week] the removal of the benches sparked outrage some claiming it was meant to drive the homeless away the city calls it part of an effort to modernize and clean up the area the plan includes taking out old benches and eventually putting in new sitting areas but there no timeline for when the new ones will go in only one bench remains between 8th and modesto california kcra tv stockton mike rossi sacramento darrell steinberg department of public works street modesto stockton california sacramento california mary lynne villenga kcra director of public works vellenga
